div.p: This work was supported by the Biotechnology and Biological Sciences Research Council. We acknowledge additional support from the Bangladesh Centre for Advanced Studies, Bangladesh Agricultural University, the Darwin Initiative, and the Department for International Development. We thank J. Bull, K. Short, P. Thompson, A. Wahab, M. Islam, R. Mohkles, M. Mome, C. Meisner, M. Khan, S.N. Chowdhury, J. Mumford, and anonymous reviewers for their comments and advice.
